snippet: Dr. Kendall Hansen was told he cannot paint the horse he named after himself because of a number of reasons, including a “need to protect the integrity of the sport.”
abstract: Dr Kendall Hansen, the owner of the last season's champion 2-year-old colt Hansen, wants to paint his white horse's mane and tail blue for the Gotham Stakes at Aqueduct; New York Racing Association says no.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Kendall Hansen was told he cannot paint the horse he named after himself because of a number of reasons, including a “need to protect the integrity of the sport.”

headline.seo: Colorful Owner’s White Horse Is the Bettors’ Favorite
headline.main: Colorful Owner’s White Horse Is the Bettors’ Favorite
headline.print_headline: Colorful Owner’s White Horse Is the Bettors’ Favorite
